title: Panela de Barro
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Aside from its a la carte menu, it offers a self service salad buffet with dishes containing rice, beans, vegetables, green leaves, and cold bean salads.
streetAddress: R. Santo Antônio Claret, 164, Bairro Jd. Chapadão
